title: Culture
description: Schema for submitting a cultured sample.

post_differentiation_time.comment: Biosample with a specified post_differentiation_time requires post_differentiation_time_units specification.

post_differentiation_time_units.comment: Biosample with a specified post_differentiation_time_units requires post_differentiation_time specification.

culture_harvest_date.title: Culture harvest date
culture_harvest_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the biosample was taken.
culture_harvest_date.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD. The property should be limited to biosamples with biosample_ontology classification that belongs to [primary cell, cell line, in vitro differentiated cells].

culture_start_date.title: Culture start date
culture_start_date.description: For cultured samples, the date the culture was started. For cell lines, the date this particular growth was started, not the date the line was established.
culture_start_date.comment: Date should be submitted in as YYYY-MM-DD. The property should be limited to biosamples with biosample_ontology classification that belongs to [primary cell, cell line, in vitro differentiated cells].

growth_medium.title: Growth medium
growth_medium.description: Medium in which the sample grew.

post_differentiation_time.title: Post-differentiation time
post_differentiation_time.description: The time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were differentiated.
post_differentiation_time.comment: Use in conjunction with post_differentiation_time_units to specify time elapsed post-differentiation. Use of this property requires post_differentiation_time_units specification.

post_differentiation_time_units.title: Post-differentiation time units
post_differentiation_time_units.description: The units of time that elapsed past the point when biosamples were differentiated.
post_differentiation_time_units.comment: Use in conjunction with post_differentiation_time to specify time elapsed post-differentiation. Use of this property requires post_differentiation_time specification.

differentiation_factors.title: Differentiation factors
differentiation_factors.description: Factors added to the culture medium in order to alter the differentiation state of the cullture.

differentiation_method.title: Differentiation method
differentiation_method.description: The description of the differentiation method.
